thread.title: Monday Morning Analyst: UFC 208, scoring in MMA, Anderson Silva vs. Derek Brunson talk
thread.title_full: Monday Morning Analyst: UFC 208, scoring in MMA, Anderson Silva vs. Derek Brunson talk

author: Luke Thomas
title: Monday Morning Analyst: UFC 208, scoring in MMA, Anderson Silva vs. Derek Brunson talk
text:
share 
In this episode of the podcast, we discuss UFC 208 results with a special focus on the scoring in the Holly Holm vs. Germaine de Randamie and Anderson Silva vs. Derek Brunson bouts. We'll also explore why there's such wildly different scoring outcomes even from credentialed observers.
